text.section: In this article the following words have the meanings indicated.
"County" means a county of the State and, unless expressly provided otherwise, Baltimore City.

"Governmental unit" means:
the State;
a county, municipal corporation, or other political subdivision of the State; or
a unit of the State government or of a political subdivision.
"Person" means an individual, receiver, trustee, guardian, personal representative, fiduciary, or representative of any kind and any partnership, firm, association, corporation, or other entity.

"State" means:
a state, possession, or commonwealth of the United States;
except as provided in § 8-101(w) of this article, a territory of the United States; or
the District of Columbia.
